|| *HMA.HP.PN.SC* || Nucleus Subceruleus || Premotor Nucleus || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| *HMA.HP.PRF.GCR* || Gigantocellular Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Projects to hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| *HMA.HP.PRF.CRF* || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep ||
|| *HMA.HP.PRF.RPO* || Oral Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediation of changing to and from REM sleep || Part of horizontal gaze center ||
|| *HMA.HP.PRF.PDT* || Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate saccadic eye movements || Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but<BR>not learning ||
|| *HMA.HP.PTP.PTR* || Principal Trigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Upper, maxillary, ophthalmic ||
|| *HMA.HP.PTP.TRM* || Trigeminal Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Muscles of first branchial arch || Pontine Nuclei, lower face and jaw control, Motor<BR>Nucleus of V n. ||
|| *HMA.HM.TGM.PE5* || Peritrigeminal Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Thermoregulation || Project to thermosensitive neurons of medial<BR>preoptic area ||
|| *HMA.HM.TGM.PA5* || Paratrigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Orofacial nociceptive sensory processing || Somatosensory reflex, site for nociceptive inputs<BR>from sciatic innervation field ||
|| *HMA.HM.TGM.STR* || Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception || Pontine Nuclei, part of cranial nerve nuclei, ear ||
|| *HMA.HM.SOL* || Solitary Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry taste buds, thoracic and abdominal viscera || c.n. VII, IX, X ||
|| *HMA.HM.HYG* || Hypoglossal Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Control of tongue ||  ||
|| *HMA.HM.INM* || Intercalated Nucleus of Medulla || Premotor Nucleus || Coordinate tongue movements, vestibuloocular reflex || Receives sensory inputs from neck region ||
|| *HMA.HM.AMB* || Ambiguus Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Control muscles of pharynx || On par with VGM, speech ||
|| *HMA.SC.VH.ISL* || Spinal Accessory Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Control of neck || Rotate head, continuus from AMB ||
